english.segment1: Elvis lives in Greece. has changed his name to Joe. The lunar lander filmed in Disney's Studio. God save me' I'm crazy? No!
english.segment2: I'm a weirdo for knowin' what I know?. I'm a weirdo?. Whatever floats your boat I'm a weirdo?. I know I believe in You
english.segment3: Mikey died from little rocks that could go pop. The army hides what just put circles in your crop. Oh maybe and I'm crazy? No!
english.segment4: I'm a weirdo for knowin' what I know?. I'm a weirdo?. And dont it get your goat I'm a weirdo?. I know I believe in You
english.segment5: We took a hit on the big bang. It screwed up the yin yang. If the truth is pig feed. then God is Siegfried and Roy - oh boy
